--- 
title: "Communicating Maths important dates overview"
author: "Tamsin Smith"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:
  html_document:
    css: style.css
  bookdown::gitbook:
    css: style.css
    mathjax:
      loader:
        load: '[tex]/cancel'
      tex:
        packages:
          '[+]': cancel
  pdf_document: default
site: bookdown::bookdown_site
documentclass: book
description: An overview of important dates for communicating maths students 2023.
always_allow_html: yes
---

```{r, setup, include=FALSE}
# This allows knitr to automagically take a screen shot of any html used
# in the documents and then use that image in the pdfs it generates
# delay = 2 - this gives time for the webpage to load before taking the screen shot.
# cliprect = 'viewport' - 
# vheight = 800 - this is set to the same as the height of the embedded NUMBAS questions
library(webshot2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  screenshot.opts = list(delay = 2, cliprect = 'viewport', vheight = 800)
)
```

# Welcome {-}

This document contains an overview of important dates for communicating maths students 2023.
